result.title: 2015 - 2016 Marine Biological Association of the UK (MBA) and Environment Agency (EA) Tamar Estuary southwest England smelt and shad fish surveys EC18234
result.name: 2015-2016-marine-biological-association-of-the-uk-mba-and-environment-agency-ea-tamar-estuary-s1
result.notes: Beam and otter trawl surveys between Morwellham Quay and West Mud of the River Tamar, southwest England, for smelt and shad, between 2015-08-06 and 2016-03-14 recording total length and representative weights of targeted species and other fishes as part of contract EC18234 between Natural England, the Marine Biological Association and the Environment Agency.

extras.value: Environment Agency, Bristol Head Office (originator); Marine Biological Association of the UK (MBA) (originator, custodian)

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

harvest.value: Marine Environmental Data Information Network (MEDIN) node hosted by MARIS (Netherlands)
